Conference Schedule

October 2016 5th German VuFind Community Meeting
Freiburg, Germany - October 11-12, 2016
This two-day event will be held at The University Library of Freiburg. More details coming soon. March 2016 LILRC Technical Services Open Forum
Farmingdale, NY - March 4, 2016 (10am-12pm)
This event, held at the Farmingdale Public Library, includes a talk about VuFind implementation. October 2015 VuFind Summit 2015
Villanova, PA - October 12-13, 2015
The 2015 developers conference was held at Falvey Memorial Library. See the wiki for details.
4th German VuFind Meeting 2015
Germany, University of Constance, Room R511 - October 6-7, 2015
 October 2014 VuFind Summit 2014
Villanova, PA - October 13-14, 2014
A 2014 developers conference was held at Falvey Memorial Library -- see the wiki for details. September 2014 3rd German VuFind Meeting 2014
Frankfurt am Main, Germany - September 24-25, 2014
 October 2013 VuFind Summit 2013
Villanova, PA - October 14-15, 2013
A 2013 developers conference is now past. See the wiki for details.
Featured creators and stories: a facemeeting on open source for libraries
Rome, Italy - October 1, 2013
This multi-lingual open source conference featured some
VuFind content. More details available in English, Italian and Spanish. September 2013 VuFind Community Meeting 2013
Hamburg, Germany - September 16-17, 2013
This German-language event continued conversations from the 2012 German VuFind Session.
To learn more, see this page. October 2012 VuFind Summit 2012
Villanova, PA - October 15-16, 2012
The follow-up to 2010's 2.0 planning meeting included detailed discussion of the new release and opportunities to network with other VuFind users. The wiki has more details. June 2012 VuFind Session 2012
Leipzig, Germany - June 26-27, 2012
This German-language event covered all aspects of VuFind use and development and is of interest to system librarians and software developers. To learn more, see this page. February 2011 Code4lib 2011
Bloomington, IN - February 7-11, 2011
At least three VuFind-related talks were featured, and a breakout session was held. September 2010 Meeting of the AGMB 2010
Mainz, Germany - September 29, 2010 - 9:00-9:35am
Room P1, Session 6
Project bibnet.org, presented by Markus Fischer - Solothurner Spitäler AG
VuFind 2.0 Conference
Villanova, PA - September 15-16, 2010
This meeting was used to plan the next release of VuFind; please see the wiki for more details and to sign up.
Midwest VuFind Meeting Kalamazoo, MI - September 3, 2010 - 9:00am-1:00pm
Western Michigan University
A meeting for people who administer, customize, and contribute code to VuFind.
Contact Scott Garrison (scott <dot> garrison <at> wmich <dot> edu) if you are interested in attending. June 2010 Catholic Research Resources Alliance All-Members Meeting
VuFind Discussion: Open to non-members; since CRRA uses VuFind for their Catholic Portal, they want to support general development of the software.
Washington, DC - June 28, 2010 - 3:30-5:00pm
Georgetown University - Murray Room on the 5th floor of Lauinger Library
Note: A government-issued ID is required to enter the building. February 2010 NERCOMP New Discovery Tools Symposium

Schedule a Presentation

We would love to present VuFind at your next conference. Feel free to contact us about scheduling a presentation.
demian.katz@villanova.edu

Past Presentations


Demian Katz describes how VuFind uses WorldCat Identities and OCLC Terminology Services to provide users with suggested terms.


Andrew Nagy and Chris Barr talk about VuFind from Paul Albert on Vimeo.
